channel.title: EliteScape V4 718/753 - Hybrid 803+ (VPS Hosted/Full Dung,Construction/RS Remake
channel.description:
[B]EliteScape V4 Release [/B]
[IMG]http://i60.tinypic.com/1z1yzqq.jpg[/img]
Welcome To The Official Thread Advertisement For EliteScape! Special Thanks To EliteUnion Development Team For Making A Really Great And Stable Private Server.
____________________________________________________ [B]Server Information And Highlights![/B]
Our Server Is Online 24/7 And VPS Hosted With A 100Mb Connection And Also Being Run Through Eclipse IDE Our Server Is New So It Currently Isn't Very Active With Only 4 People On A Day. Our Server Offers You The Choice Of Picking A Economy Account Or A Pking/Spawn Account! When Our Server Updates You Don't Have To Re-Log With The New EXE Client, It Will Re-Connect. We Have 100% Bank Pins And Bank Tabs We Are Still Currently Spawning Every Correct NPC In Place To Get That 2012 RuneScape Fell Again, Along With Some Custom Items From A 803 Cache! We Have 100% Slayer, Yes You Heard It Right 100%!!! Every Slayer Master Works, Giving Ever Possible Slayer Task Dungeonerring/Construction Both Work Properly, There Not 100% Exactly Like Real RuneScape But Its Adavanced! So I Would Say 100% For A RSPS. We Have About 20 Or Mort Quests That Players Can Complete, The Lost City, Restless Ghost, Ernest The Chicken, Imp Catcher And More! We Have A Great Development Team Who Are Always On The Look Out For Content To Improve The RSPS! Our Promise To You Is That Your PlayerSave And Data Will Be Kept 100% Safe!! We Can Even Give You A Copy To Keep In-Case You Fell In-Secure Our Promise To You Is That Our Loyalty/Service To Players Is Infinity And Our Server Will Always Be Online For The Next 10 Years Guarantee. Our Trivia System Is 100% And Has Abit Of Everything -> History, Humour, Knowledge! We Will Soon Have A Option To Select 3 Worlds In 1 Client Picking Your Favorite Revision To Play! (317, 718, 803) We Have Evil Trees For Great Woodcutting Experience! Clan Creation, Friend's Chat Creation 100% Favorited 803 Items Like - Seismic, Noxious, Tectonic. Malevolent, Sirenic And Tons More! Ability To Change Looks To 317, 803 Heaps Of Minigames Like - Penguin Hide N Seek, Assassin Skill, Zombies Minigame, Invasion, Goblin Raids, Flash Demon Mobs, Sinkholes, Random Events 100% Gravestones Even Pick Your Desired One!! ____________________________________________________
[B]How To Play[/B]
Web Client
[URL=http://"http://eliteunion.wix.com/elitescape#!play-now/c12syhttp://"]Play On Our Website![/URL]
EliteScape V4 Client
Executable Version (Much Sexier) [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/n23kk7917d88ryd/EliteScape+V4+%28GUI%29.exe"]EliteScape V4 Exeutable Client[/URL]
Java Version (Much Faster, "Safer") [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/download/5va8eo565ff588r/EliteScape.jar"]EliteScape V4 Java Client[/URL] ____________________________________________________ [B]Our Website/Forums[/B]
Visit Our Forums/Website For More Info On Our Server! And Exclusive Update News Feed!
[URL=http://"http://EliteUnion.wix.com/EliteScape"]Website[/URL] [URL=http://"http://EliteUnion.createaforum.com"]Forums[/URL] ____________________________________________________ [IMG]http://i57.tinypic.com/2nsmdfl.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/2v13mz9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/4jq3wz.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/zvtnyb.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2myqdjd.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i62.tinypic.com/ke95xc.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i61.tinypic.com/2a5i0iq.jpg[/img]
[B]Note To TroubleShooters.....[/B] If You Have A Black Screen When You Log In, Or If Its Really Laggy... For EG - Bad Frame Rates.. Play Around With Your Graphic Settings In The Tool Bar... Make Sure Its On "openGL" Not SafeMode Or DirectX - If It Takes A While To Check For Updates Please Be Patient, It Can Take Up To A MAX Of 6 Minutes! - Wondering Why Checking For Updates / Downloading Updates Takes So Long? Cause Its Your First Time, Our Shared Cache Is Huge Because Of The Custom's We Inputed! -

item.description:
@EliteIV wrote:

[B]EliteScape V4 Release [/B]

Welcome To The Official Thread Advertisement For EliteScape!
Special Thanks To EliteUnion Development Team For Making A Really Great And Stable Private Server.

[B]Server Information And Highlights![/B]

Our Server Is Online 24/7 And VPS Hosted With A 100Mb Connection And Also Being Run Through Eclipse IDE
Our Server Is New So It Currently Isn’t Very Active With Only 4 People On A Day.
Our Server Offers You The Choice Of Picking A Economy Account Or A Pking/Spawn Account!
When Our Server Updates You Don’t Have To Re-Log With The New EXE Client, It Will Re-Connect.
We Have 100% Bank Pins And Bank Tabs
We Are Still Currently Spawning Every Correct NPC In Place To Get That 2012 RuneScape Fell Again, Along With Some Custom Items From A 803 Cache!
We Have 100% Slayer, Yes You Heard It Right 100%!!! Every Slayer Master Works, Giving Ever Possible Slayer Task
Dungeonerring/Construction Both Work Properly, There Not 100% Exactly Like Real RuneScape But Its Adavanced! So I Would Say 100% For A RSPS.
We Have About 20 Or Mort Quests That Players Can Complete, The Lost City, Restless Ghost, Ernest The Chicken, Imp Catcher And More!
We Have A Great Development Team Who Are Always On The Look Out For Content To Improve The RSPS!
Our Promise To You Is That Your PlayerSave And Data Will Be Kept 100% Safe!! We Can Even Give You A Copy To Keep In-Case You Fell In-Secure
Our Promise To You Is That Our Loyalty/Service To Players Is Infinity And Our Server Will Always Be Online For The Next 10 Years Guarantee.
Our Trivia System Is 100% And Has Abit Of Everything -> History, Humour, Knowledge!
We Will Soon Have A Option To Select 3 Worlds In 1 Client Picking Your Favorite Revision To Play! (317, 718, 803)
We Have Evil Trees For Great Woodcutting Experience!
Clan Creation, Friend’s Chat Creation 100%
Favorited 803 Items Like - Seismic, Noxious, Tectonic. Malevolent, Sirenic And Tons More!
Ability To Change Looks To 317, 803
Heaps Of Minigames Like - Penguin Hide N Seek, Assassin Skill, Zombies Minigame, Invasion, Goblin Raids, Flash Demon Mobs, Sinkholes, Random Events
100% Gravestones Even Pick Your Desired One!!

[B]How To Play[/B]

Web Client

[URL=http://“http://eliteunion.wix.com/elitescape#!play-now/c12syhttp://”]Play On Our Website![/URL]

EliteScape V4 Client

[B]Our Website/Forums[/B]

Visit Our Forums/Website For More Info On Our Server! And Exclusive Update News Feed!

[URL=http://“http://EliteUnion.wix.com/EliteScape”]Website[/URL]
[URL=http://“http://EliteUnion.createaforum.com”]Forums[/URL]







[B]Note To TroubleShooters…[/B]
If You Have A Black Screen When You Log In, Or If Its Really Laggy… For EG - Bad Frame Rates… Play Around With Your Graphic Settings In The Tool Bar… Make Sure Its On “openGL” Not SafeMode Or DirectX -
If It Takes A While To Check For Updates Please Be Patient, It Can Take Up To A MAX Of 6 Minutes! -
Wondering Why Checking For Updates / Downloading Updates Takes So Long? Cause Its Your First Time, Our Shared Cache Is Huge Because Of The Custom’s We Inputed! -
